synthesis_conditions.procedure: An acetonitrile solution of rhodium(II) benzoate was allowed to stand at room temperature with a linking ligand vapor (pyrazine, 2-methylpyrazine, 2,3-dimethylpyrazine). After one month, polymerized complexes 1a−3a had crystallized in the form of reddish-orange plates.
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: The crystals were collected by filtration, washed with methanol, and air-dried.

synthesis_conditions.procedure: A methanol solution of copper(II) acetate monohydrate and benzoic acid was allowed to stand for several days with the slow diffusion of pyrazine (pyz, 2-mpyz, 2,3-dmpyz) vapor. Polymerized complexes of 1b−3b crystallized in the form of blue plates.
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: The crystals were washed with a slight amount of methanol and air-dried.

chemicals_used.name: Deuterized benzoate complexes [Rh2(O2C−C6D5)4(R-pyz)]n
chemicals_used.note: R = H (1a′), 2-mpyz (2a′), 2,3-dmpyz (3a′) and deuterized pyrazine complex [Rh2(O2C−C6H5)4(pyz-d4)]n (1a′′)

synthesis_conditions.procedure: Deuterized benzoate complexes and deuterized pyrazine complex were synthesized by the same method using corresponding deuterized ligands.
synthesis_conditions.note: Specific amounts and conditions are not provided.
